thread.title: Trixy Elle (centre, L), and other survivors of super Typhoon Rai on Thursday called on British oil giant Shell to provide financial compensation for climate-related devastation
thread.title_full: Trixy Elle (centre, L), and other survivors of super Typhoon Rai on Thursday called on British oil giant Shell to provide financial compensation for climate-related devastation

author: Ted ALJIBE
title: Trixy Elle (centre, L), and other survivors of super Typhoon Rai on Thursday called on British oil giant Shell to provide financial compensation for climate-related devastation
text:
Trixy Elle (centre, L), and other survivors of super Typhoon Rai on Thursday called on British oil giant Shell to provide financial compensation for climate-related devastation
- Ted ALJIBE
- Updated
0
Tags
As featured on
Survivors of a deadly 2021 typhoon in the Philippines have filed a lawsuit against British oil giant Shell, seeking financial compensation for climate-related devastation, three NGOs supporting them said Thursday.
